description.hltext_display: İspanya sigara yasağını genişletti
description.author: Hürriyet Avrupa
description.content:
22 Aralık 2010
İspanya'da sigara yasağını genişleten yeni yasa kabul edildi.
Yeni yasayla, 2006'da kapalı kamusal alanda uygulanmaya başlayan sigara yasağı, barlar, restoranlar, hastane yakınları, okul bahçesi ve televizyon programlarında da uygulanmaya başlayacak.
Yasak 2 Ocakta yürürlüğe girecek. Başbakan Jose Luis Rodrigues Zapatero ve iktidardaki Sosyalist Partinin sunduğu yasa tasarısı, parlamentonun alt kanadında 154'e karşı 189 oyla kabul edildi.
Mecliste dün yapılan oylamada, kumarhaneler ve barlarda sigara içilebilen alanlara izin verilmesi yönündeki yasa değişikliği teklifi de reddedildi.
Dikkat: Sitede yer alan haberlerin izinsiz kullanılması durumunda yasal işlem ba

description.hltext_display: Market overview: Chipmaker ARM sizzles
description.content: 0825 Footsie is little changed in early dealings as the Christmas break approaches. ARM Holdings is a notable riser, with the chipmaker's shares up 10%. Software giant Microsoft is expected to announce a new operating system that run's on ARM's technology. BSkyB is higher following news that Business Secretary Vince Cable, who said he had declared war on Rupert Murdoch over his News Corporation's plans to take over the satellite broadcaster, will no longer have any say over the matter. FTSE 100 up 2 at 5,954.

description.hltext_display: It's the lifelong dream of Obama and Democrats.
Manufacturing Flavored Espresso Beans
description.content: The sprouting of specialty coffee retailers has stirred many people worldwide into consuming coffee. Even multi-nationwide espresso store corporations have determined to go head on and open espresso shops in China the place tea is very in style amongst hot beverages. The flavored coffee bean sector has tripled and even quadrupled its gross sales volume for the past few many years when individuals have realized the wealthy complementary flavor of flavored coffee beans. Espresso experts would view the flavoring of the espresso as an enhancement of what really is the true coffee taste and to not overpower it. Many have come to like their favourite flavored coffee bean however just a few have come to see and share what actually goes behind in making it. Processing of the beansThe widespread technique of processing the espresso bean is the dry method. The harvested beans are laid on the dryer and are uncovered to the solar for it to dehydrate. Through milling, the espresso bean is then separated from the plant or other debris. The subsequent step is roasting the beans. Roasting can have five different ranges of roast that are commonly often called the next: American Roast, Viennese Roast, Italian Roast, French Dark Roast, and Espresso Black Roast.Adding the Taste to the BeansThe best kind of roast the place a flavor may be appreciated is the medium roast. The flavor is just right to be tasted with out sacrificing the roasted espresso's style nor having too highly effective a roast to be flavored with. Having a mild roasted espresso bean flavored can raise the espresso's taste to be lost with the flavoring and a darkish roasted coffee can trample the flavoring added to it. An business extensive apply is to restrict the flavoring oil to solely 2 - 3% of the whole weight of the processed batch to have a great stability of style and aroma between espresso roast and flavoring. Packing the Flavored Coffee BeansAfter the mixing process, the flavored coffee beans are packed in foiled packages to make sure freshness and seal all of the oils inside to protect that rich taste, texture and aroma. Since the means of roasting coffee beans releases the important oils and will stale quickly, packing these beans should be performed as rapidly as possible so that it gained't be exposed to the environment and to make sure that the packaging is oxygen free as possible. To make sure recent flavored brewed coffee, the processed roast must be consumed inside to three weeks from its manufacture date and have to be stored in a cool, dark place.

description.hltext_display: Rama Yade devrait être nommée ambassadrice à l'Unesco ce mercredi
description.author: no-reply@20minutes.fr
description.content:
Rama Yade, ex-Secrétaire d’Etat aux sports, le 10 mars 2010 à Paris. I.SIMON/SIPA
POLITIQUE - Elle remplace Catherine Colonna...
L'inactivité aura été de courte durée pour Rama Yade. L'ex-secrétaire d'Etat devrait être nommée ce mercredi en Conseil des ministres ambassadrice, déléguée permanente de la France auprès de l'Unesco en remplacement de Catherine Colonna, a indiqué une source proche du dossier, confirmant une information de RTL.
Figurant parmi les personnalités les plus populaires en France, Rama Yade, 34 ans, devrait être nommée ambassadrice auprès de l'Organisation des Nations unies pour l'éducation, la science et la culture, dont le siège est à Paris. Ex porte-parole de l'Elysée sous Jacques Chirac, ex-ministre de Affaires européennes, Catherine Colonna occupait cette fonction depuis 2008.
Incarnation de l'anti-conformisme plus que de la «diversité»
Rama Yade a été secrétaire d'Etat aux droits de l'Homme (2007-2009) puis secrétaire d'Etat aux Sports (2009-2010). Après avoir fait ses premières armes à l'UMP, poussée par Nicolas Sarkozy, elle a rejoint récemment Jean-Louis Borloo au parti radical. De la visite de Kadhafi à sa critique -tardive- du discours de Dakar, en passant par ses caprices électoraux, la jeune femme, qui a eu 34 ans en décembre, a incarné au gouvernement l'anti-conformisme plus que la «diversité», aux Droits de l'homme puis aux Sports.
Née à Dakar d'un couple d'enseignants proche de Senghor, elle est arrivée en France à onze ans. Elle est diplômée de Sciences po, administratrice du Sénat, avant d'apparaître pour la première fois sous les feux des projecteurs le jour de l'investiture de Nicolas Sarkozy comme candidat UMP à l'élection présidentielle en janvier 2007. Battue aux municipales à Colombes (Hauts-de-Seine) en 2008, Rama Yade a tenu tête à deux reprises au chef de l'Etat et à l'UMP en refusant de se présenter aux Européennes en 2009, puis en choisissant de se présenter dans les Hauts-de-Seine et non dans le Val-d'Oise aux régionales de 2010.

description.hltext_display: Pakistan'dan sonra Hindistan da füze denedi
description.author: Hürriyet Avrupa
description.content:
22 Aralık 2010
Pakistan'ın ardından Hindistan da, Prithvi-II isimli balistik füze demesi yaptı.
Hindistan Stratejik Kuvvet Komuta Merkezinden (SFC) yapılan açıklamada, yerel saatle 08:15'te ateşlenen 350 kilometre menzile sahip Prithvi-II balistik füzesine nükleer başlık takılabileceğini bildirildi.
SFC, hedefine başarıyla ulaşan füzenin ordu için rutin bir dememe olduğunu belirtti. Hindistan'ın komşusu ve rakibi Pakistan, 1300 kilometre menzile sahip, nükleer başlık takılabilecek Ghauri Hataf-V isimli balistik füze dememesini dün başarıyla gerçekleştirmişti.
Dikkat: Sitede yer alan haberlerin izinsiz kullanılması durumunda yasal işlem ba

description.hltext_display: Catering Equipment - Taking a Look at the Most Effective Not New Catering Equipment For Your Business
description.content: Catering equipment is, of course, integral to any market engaged in the food service business and there are many factors to remember when it comes to purchasing catering apparatus. First and foremost, you will have to consider whether or not your enterprise requires brand new catering equipment or if secondhand catering equipment would be more applicable for your requirements.If you are just in the food service industry, it is always a worthwhile idea to speak to specialist catering equipment suppliers to look for their counsel about both what sort of catering equipment that you would initially require and whether that catering equipment needs to be new or reconditioned. Evidently, the term catering equipment incorporates a comprehensive spectrum and it can be used to refer to everything from kitchen grills to glass washing equipment. The sort of catering equipment that you'll require is invariably dependent on the classification of food you'll be serving and the number of customers that you imagine that you'll be catering to.Catering Equipment - Making a choice Between New and Reconditioned catering equipmentUndeniably, budgetary constraints may well be the chief consideration when it comes to determining whether or not to use new or secondhand catering equipment but, it is fair to say, that there are many reputable suppliers of used catering equipment, so, for those who are working within a budget, it may well prove constructive to look into the more financially viable option of buying used catering equipment. For those seeking to solidify their position in the catering industry, some of the new or used catering equipment that may be prerequisite includes:Glass Washers - For any caterers offering beverages, one of the most critical pieces of catering equipment to install is glass washers. Buyers won't stand for unclean glasses and it is possible to pick up new or used glass washers for a reasonable price.Stainless Steel Sinks & Tables - The use of stainless style fixtures and fittings is fairly typical for practically companies who deal in the food service market and so far as catering equipment goes, stainless steel sinks and tables are two of the most significant forms of catering equipment to be installed first.

description.hltext_display: Pennsylvania and New Jersey will each lose a seat in Congress
description.content:
Inquirer Staff Writers
Pennsylvania and New Jersey each will lose a seat in Congress as a result of slow population growth over the last decade.
The losses, announced Tuesday by the U.S. Census Bureau, reflect the decades-long shift of political clout from the Northeast and Midwest to faster-growing areas of the West and South.
In other words, Florida's and Texas' gain are Pennsylvania's and New Jersey's loss.
With 435 seats in the House of Representatives to be apportioned on the basis of the 2010 census, Pennsylvania's share will drop from 19 seats to 18 and New Jersey's from 13 to 12.
Texas will gain the most seats, four. It will rank second only to California, which retains 53 seats.
The Lone Star State will have twice the House delegation it had in 1920. Pennsylvania, which has lost more seats than any other big state, will have half what it had 90 years ago.
"Although it is disappointing, this result was expected," said State Senate Majority Leader Dominic Pileggi (R., Delaware). "It is one of the consequences of the fact that Pennsylvania's population growth has not kept pace with other states."
Gov. Rendell, appearing Tuesday night on CNN, said Pennsylvania's plight could have been worse. He noted that the state had lost "multiple seats" in several previous censuses.
Still the sixth-largest of the 50 states, Pennsylvania had its population grow 3.4 percent from 2000 to 2010, compared with 9.7 percent for the nation as a whole. As of April, according to the census, it had 12,702,379 residents.
New Jersey's population grew at a slightly faster rate - 4.5 percent, to 8,791,894. It slid from ninth-largest to 11th.
The population changes tallied by the census every 10 years dictate a reallotment of congressional seats. They also set the stage for state legislative districts to be remapped to account for shifts within states. That makes the count critical to both major parties' interests in Harrisburg and Trenton.
More detailed community-by-community population data are to be released by the census starting in February. But party leaders are already thinking about which members of Congress may get squeezed out by the realignment.
If the past is any guide, the remapping is likely to be highly politicized. In Pennsylvania, Republicans will be in the driver's seat.
That is because the Nov. 2 election gave Republicans control of the governorship and state House; they already ruled in the Senate. This puts them in position to redraw districts to suit their own needs.
Courts have held that districts must have equal populations. But they can be gerrymandered to favor one party.
Pennsylvania political sources say GOP leaders are likely to push two Western Pennsylvania Democrats - incumbents Jason Altmire and Mark Critz - into the same House district. The pair would then have to fight it out in a 2012 Democratic primary.
Population estimates have shown growth in some areas of the state - the Poconos and parts of the South and Southeast - while other areas, especially in Western Pennsylvania, have declined.
There is talk that the GOP may also move to protect Bucks County's Republican congressman-elect, Mike Fitzpatrick, by rejiggering district lines. Some Philadelphia voters now within the borders of his Bucks-centered district may be moved to U.S. Rep. Allyson Schwartz's district.
Schwartz, a Democrat in a district that is mostly in Montgomery County, is already in a strong position politically, so the shift would not affect the power balance.
Like most states, Pennsylvania allows party chiefs to control the remapping triggered every 10 years by the census.
"Our process is totally political," said former U.S. Rep. Joseph M. Hoeffel III, now a Montgomery County commissioner. "Other states have figured out ways to make it much less political. They have a commission. They have figured out a way to do it on a more bipartisan basis."
Hoeffel knows how these things play out. A decade ago, he was in Congress when the census dictated that Pennsylvania would lose two seats.
Republicans, also in control of Harrisburg then, combined Hoeffel's district with that of U.S. Rep. Robert Borski, a Philadelphia Democrat. It looked as if Hoeffel and Borski were headed for a primary battle in 2002 till Borski decided to retire.
New Jersey, by contrast, has a bipartisan commission handle redistricting. Twelve members, evenly divided between the parties, select a 13th who becomes chairman - and possibly the tie-breaking vote in mapping disputes.
New Jersey GOP Chairman Jay Webber, a Morris County assemblyman, said: "Taking it out of the legislative process does make it as apolitical as you can make it - which isn't very much."

event_or_fact.property: Taking it out of the legislative process does make it as apolitical as you can make it - which isn't very much.
Although it is disappointing, this result was expected; It is one of the consequences of the fact that Pennsylvania's population growth has not kept pace with other states.
Pennsylvania's plight could have been worse
the state had lost "multiple seats" in several previous censuses.

description.hltext_display: Kombouaré s'est chauffé avec Sessegnon
description.author: no-reply@20minutes.fr
description.content:
L'entraîneur parisien Antoine Kombouaré, le 31 octobre 2010, à Montpellier. DAMOURETTE/SIPA
FOOTBALL - Le coach du PSG, après une discussion musclée avec le Béninois, lui aurait tenu des propos insultants...
On ne rigole pas avec Casque d’Or. Alors que le PSG se déplace à Nancy ce mercredi soir, Antoine Kombouaré aurait eu une discussion virulente mardi avec son milieu de terrain Stéphane Sessegnon, rapporte L’Equipe du jour.
>> Suivez tous les matchs de la dernière journée de L1 en live comme-à-la-maison à partir de 19h
Frustré par son statut de remplaçant, le Béninois a demandé un entretien à son coach dans son bureau, n’hésitant pas à brandir la menace d’un transfert. Hors de question pour Kombouaré, qui n’aurait pas accepté l’insistance de son joueur: devant des demandes répétés, l’entraîneur du PSG aurait «tenu des propos insultants et l’aurait éjecté de son bureau avec virulence», rapporte le quotidien.
Sans parler de cet incident, l’ancien tacticien de Valenciennes a expliqué en point presse un peu plus tard qu’il n’y aurait pas de départ. «Je défends les intérêts de l’équipe. On a besoin de tout le monde car on n’est pas nombreux», a lancé Kombouaré. Pas sûr qu’un Sessegnon boudeur serve à grand-chose.

description.hltext_display: 500-Millionen-Deal mit der US-Justiz
description.content:
Die Deutsche Bank hat sich mit der US-Justiz vor dem Hintergrund eines Ermittlungsverfahrens auf die Zahlung einer Geldstrafe geeinigt. Insgesamt zahlt das Institut 553,6 Millionen Dollar, wie der Dax-Konzern am Dienstagabend mitteilte. Im Gegenzug verzichte die Behörde auf eine Strafverfolgung. Die von dem Frankfurter Geldhaus zusammen mit Bankers Trust übernommene Investmentbank Alex Brown & Sons hatte von 1996 bis 2002 ihren Kunden ein von der Wirtschaftsprüfungsgesellschaft KPMG entwickeltes Produkt zum Steuern sparen angeboten. Die Behörden hatten dieses Produkt jedoch als nicht zulässig angesehen. Ab 2002 wurden es dann nicht mehr angeboten.
KPMG stand wegen des Steuersparmodells bereits selbst im Fokus der Ermittlungen. Die Wirtschaftsprüfungsgesellschaft hatte sich mit den Behörden auf die Zahlung von 456 Millionen Dollar geeinigt, die Vorwürfe waren daraufhin fallen gelassen worden.
Bei der Deutschen Bank soll die nun vereinbarte Zahlung keine Auswirkungen auf das laufende Ergebnis haben, hieß es weiter. Es seien ausreichend Rückstellungen gebildet worden. Auf das laufende Nachsteuerergebnis werde die Einigung keine Auswirkungen haben.

description.hltext_display: 重庆造笔记本电脑出口量已突破50万台
description.content:
“最多的时候，一天要走三万六千多台。”重庆海关驻西永园区工作组曹华武科长介绍，重庆笔记本出口量正在迅速增长。今年9月26日开通的渝欧国际货运专属航线，成为重庆造笔记本电脑出口的“主通道”。目前，共有745票、32.6万余台电脑通过此航线出口，累计货值达1.52亿美元。而稍早前开通的渝深海铁联运成为笔记本出口的另一主要方式，通过这一线路已发送108票、21万余台笔记本电脑出口，货值近1亿美元。
重庆海关努力打造的通关“快车道”正成为重庆笔记本电脑基地项目建设的另一强力“助推器”。针对IT产品出货快、频次高的特点，重庆海关在空港专门建立了IT电子产品通关绿色通道，使空运出口的IT货物实际通关时间始终保持在10分钟以内;在铁运现场，海关设置专人专岗对IT货物实行全日制通关审核，确保了“随到、随验、随放”。

description.hltext_display: Ontario First Nations Receive Pierce Pumpers
description.content:
Pierce is supplying 15 commercial pumpers to Ontario First Nations communities throughout the province of Ontario. The Ontario First Nations Technical Services Corporation (OFNTSC), whose mission includes technical advisory services for all 134 of the Ontario First Nations, purchased the vehicles. Eleven have been placed into service, and the remaining four will travel to more isolated communities this winter after ice roads are opened. All 15 trucks were delivered to the province in less than two months.The pumpers are built on a variety of commercial chassis, with a mix of top-mount and side-control pump panel configurations. Each vehicle features seating for at least two firefighters, automatic transmission, 1,000-gallon water tank, 1,250-gpm pump, winter package pump compartments, hard suction hose, and a complement of ground ladders.
The OFNTSC was established in 1995 to provide expert technical advisory services to the First Nations of Ontario. At that time, it was the first aboriginal organization in Canada mandated to provide professional technical and advisory services to First Nations communities and foster their technical self-reliance. The OFNTSC represents all 134 First Nations in Ontario, including 16 Tribal Councils, six large First Nations and 18 unaffiliated First Nations.

description.hltext_display: Britney Spears credited for her professionalism
description.author: Cover Media
description.content:
Britney Spears has been lauded for her work ethic and professionalism by Swedish producer Shellback.
The hit maker is currently working on Britney?s new album, which is yet to get a firm release date. With the LP being the first from Britney since 2008?s Circus, all concerned are hoping for a triumphant return for the former pop princess.
Britney has previously spoken of her joy about the tracks she?s recorded, with Shellback congratulating the star on her dedication to the album. He believes they have managed to create a different sound due to Britney?s competence. "[Britney]'s actually damn professional. You read a lot on the Internet that Britney is not singing and mimes, but she is actually damn professional. She's done it since she was 16. And just rhythmic way, she is f**king awesome! And you do not have to go through and talk about the rhythms and stuff that you sometimes have to do. She's very easy in the studio," he told a local radio station.

description.hltext_display: Çin'de robot garsonlar işbaşı yaptı
description.author: Hürriyet Avrupa
description.content:
22 Aralık 2010
Çin'deki bir restoran müşterilerine, sabrı hiç tükenmeyen ve asla bahşiş almayan robot garsonlarla hizmet veriyor.
Şandong eyaletinin batısındaki Jinan'da bulunan Dalu Robot restoranında, bilim kurgu efsanesi "Yıldız Savaşları"nı hatırlatan robotlar, garson ve resepsiyon görevlisi olarak müşterileri memnun etmeye çalışıyor.
Hareket sensörü yardımıyla hizmet veren ondan fazla robotun bulunduğu restoranın sahibi Zang Yongpey, böylelikle ülkesinin gelişen teknolojide ciddi bir rakip olduğunu tüm dünyaya göstermeyi umduğunu söyledi.
100 kadar kişiyi ağırlayabilen restoranda, dans eden ve konuşan bir robot da müşterileri eğlendiriyor.
Her biri 6 bin dolara mal olan robotların sayısını önümüzdeki aylarda 30'a çıkarmayı hedefleyen Zang, ayrıca restoranının çalışanlarını yeni yeteneklerle donatmayı da amaçlıyor.
(AP-PIN-GÖK)
09:09 22/12/10
"

description.hltext_display: Topeka Orders Pumpers, Aerial from Rosenbauer
description.content:
The city of Topeka, Kan., has ordered five Rosenbauer custom pumpers and one 101-foot rear-mount aerial platform truck.
The pumpers will be built on Metro Star chassis with a 360 HP engine and a 3000 EVS transmission. They will feature top mount pump panels, 1,500 GPM pumps, 750 gallon water/foam tank, extruded aluminum body, full height compartments both sides, roll-up doors, ladder storage inside body with access at rear, multiplexing, LED warning lights, Q2B siren, a Howler and a red paint scheme.
The aerial will be built on a Gladiator chassis with a 525 HP engine and a 4000 EVS transmission. The aerial will feature an extruded aluminum body, a full NFPA complement of ground ladders, large transverse forward compartments, roll-up doors, multiplexing, LED warning lights, Q2B siren, a Howler and a red paint scheme. The vehicle is also equipped with Rosenbauers exclusive Green Star idle reduction technology that uses electronic controls to shut down the chassis engine on-scene while still providing 12V electrical lighting and 15 kW 120/240 volt power.
All of the vehicles are scheduled for delivery to Topeka by March 2011.

description.hltext_display: Gatorback Fastest Lap Award Goes to Jimmie Johnson
description.author: autoevolution
description.content:
And this, we reckon, pretty much wraps up the great year Jimmie Johnson had when it comes to his racing endeavors. After making history once again, by winning five consecutive Sprint cups and got named Driver of the Year, the NASCAR driver was once again slammed with an award: Gatorback Belts Fastest Lap Award.
This is the fourth such award for Johnson, in Gatorback's seventh year of handing it. The award, which recognizes the Cup driver who wins the most Fastest Lap Awards each week, means a... ( read more )

description.hltext_display: KME Awarded Fuel Truck Orders for Multiple Fire Departments
description.content:
The Los Angeles County Fire Department has ordered a 2,000- gallon fleet refueler from KME to ensure that its apparatus has a reliable source of refueling even when in an extended stationary pumping mode.
The Orange County (Calif.) Fire Authority has ordered a 2,000- gallon aircraft refueler to service helicopters in support of firefighting activities.
The city of Indianapolis has ordered a 3,000 gallon fleet refueler with a dual pumping system for both gasoline and diesel fuel.
KME is a sole source provider of fuel trucks and custom manufactured tanks with capacities ranging from 500 to 6,000 gallons and with multiple pumping system options. KME is also a franchised truck dealer for International, Ford and Isuzu trucks.
KME has also recently added propane trucks to it fuel transport line.

description.hltext_display: Hyères: Ils laissent leur petite fille de 2 ans dans la voiture pendant qu'ils jouent au casino
description.author: no-reply@20minutes.fr
description.content:
FAIT DIVERS - Les grands-parents ont été placés en garde à vue...
Après la discothèque, le casino. Un couple de Toulonnais a été mis en garde à vue après avoir laissé dimanche soir leur petite-fille de 2 ans toute seule dans leur voiture tandis qu’ils jouaient aux machines à sous d’un établissement de Hyères (Var), rapporte Var-matin ce mercredi.
Ce sont les pleurs de l’enfant qui ont alerté les gardiens du parking souterrain. Ces derniers ont attendus en vain le retour des grands-parents avant d’expliquer à la fillette comment ouvrir la porte de la voiture.
«Un contexte familial compliqué, sur fond d’adoption et de misère»
La grand-mère de l’enfant, une Brésilienne de 45 ans, est arrivée un peu plus tard, alors que son mari, un Portugais de 55 ans, poursuivait son tour des machines à sous. Ils ont été immédiatement interpellés et placés en garde à vue. «L’affaire se situe dans un contexte familial compliqué, sur fond d’adoption et de misère», explique Var-matin.
La fillette, dont les parents sont Brésiliens, a été placée dans un foyer et une procédure pour délaissement d’enfant a été ouverte par le Parquet de Toulon, précise le quotidien. Remis en liberté, les grands-parents ont rendez-vous avec la justice le 22 avril prochain.

description.hltext_display: 惠普推出一项以旧换新促销活动
description.content:
据国外媒体报道，惠普星期一向网络巨头思科展开了最积极的攻击，推出了一项以旧换新的促销活动，让用户淘汰和更换现有的设备……
据国外媒体报道，惠普星期一向网络巨头思科展开了最积极的攻击，推出了一项以旧换新的促销活动，让用户淘汰和更换现有的设备。
惠普的促销活动名为“促进转变”，暴露思科品牌交换机的弱点，旨在取代在2011年年底接近使用寿命的网络设备。
根据以旧换新的促销条款，惠普将为上交旧的思科设备的客户提供A系列和E系列交换机，价格将比价格表便宜20%。最低的交易规模是10万美元。特别是这个节省的资金需要上交思科Catalyst 2960/S系列交换机、3560/E系列/X系列、3750/E系列/X系列、4500 E系列、4900系列或者6500系列以及思科Nexus 5000系列或者7000系列交换机。
惠普还将提供从思科设备迁移到惠普设备的迁移服务并且保证兼容性。
惠普说，它正在设法打破思科的厂商锁定。不过，用户一定要读懂这些条款。
虽然这次促销活动是否会有愿意参加的用户仍有待观察，但是，思科的客户也许会评估惠普的产品。有一件事情是肯定的：硬件厂商将在价格方面展开竞争，如果他们能够销售更多的技术产品的话。如果惠普能够打破思科的升级周期，惠普就能压缩竞争对手的利润率。惠普也有类似于IBM的针对甲骨文Sun客户的促销计划。

description.hltext_display: Russian president heads to India's financial capital
description.content:
Russian President Dmitry Medvedev headed for Mumbai on Wednesday, after squeezing in a tour of the Taj Mahal on the second leg of an India visit focused on strengthening defence and trade ties.
In Mumbai, where security has been stepped up over a reported intelligence warning of a possible militant attack targeting foreigners, Medvedev was scheduled to speak to students at a technology institute before flying home.
On Tuesday Medvedev held talks with Indian Prime Minister Manmohan Singh in New Delhi and witnessed the signing of a raft of defence and nuclear deals potentially worth billions of dollars.
The two sides also agreed to double bilateral trade to 20 billion dollars by 2015.
"I believe that trade between us does not nearly reflect our privileged partnership," Medvedev told reporters at a joint press briefing.
One standout deal was a contract on the joint design and development of fifth-generation fighter aircraft with stealth capabilities.
Although no figures were mentioned, experts say the final fighter deal could be worth close to 30 billion dollars, with India planning to induct up to 300 of the aircraft into its air force.
Medvedev's visit concluded a flurry of top-level diplomatic activity that has seen the leaders of all five permanent members of the UN Security Council beat a trade-focused path to India's door over the past six months.
British Prime Minister David Cameron was in the country in July, and US President Barack Obama, French President Nicolas Sarkozy and Chinese Premier Wen Jiabao have passed through over the last six weeks.
Each visitor brought large-scale business delegations and used the visit to trumpet new deals with the world's second-fastest-growing major economy.
Medvedev was especially keen to fend off growing international competition for a slice of India's increasingly lucrative market for military hardware -- once monopolised by Moscow.
Traditionally India's default defence supplier, Russia now has to compete with top manufacturers from Europe and the United States as India diversifies its sources of military hardware and becomes more demanding over pricing and quality.
As well as bilateral issues, Medvedev and Singh discussed regional security and agreed to deepen counter-terrorism cooperation.
"Those who hide terrorists hide criminals. No modern civilised state can hide terrorists," Medvedev said.
He made no specific mention of India's arch-rival Pakistan, which Delhi accuses of harbouring militant groups like Lashkar-e-Taiba (LeT) -- blamed for the November 2008 attacks on Mumbai.
The Press Trust of India, quoting unidentified official sources, said suspected LeT infiltration was behind the alert sounded in Mumbai on Tuesday ahead of the Christmas and New Year holidays.
"There are conscious efforts by terror organisations to target foreigners during these two festivals here," said Mumbai Police Commissioner Sanjeev Dayal.

description.hltext_display: The latest way to deal with collective bargaining deals.
爱国者电子荣获“2010消费电子自主品牌创新奖”
description.content:
近日，在《IT时代周刊》、《IT商业新闻网》联合主办的“第六届CEO年会”上，爱国者电子科技有限公司获得“2010消费电子自主品牌创新奖”……
近日，在《IT时代周刊》、《IT商业新闻网》联合主办的“第六届CEO年会”上，爱国者电子科技有限公司获得“2010消费电子自主品牌创新奖”.不足一年的时间里，爱国者电子凭借全新企业战略、全新管理理念、全新领导团队，铸就了强劲的发展动力。这一年的发展轨迹，为国内众多成长中的消费电子企业树立了榜样，成为中国民族企业发展史上一道闪亮的风景线!
本届颁奖年会在北京昆仑饭店盛大开幕，微软、惠普、惠普、创新工场、摩托罗拉、联想等业内巨头代表到场，梁念坚、李开复等近二十位CEO亲临。ZOL、太平洋电脑网、IT168等主流行业垂直网站均进行了现场报道，新浪、搜狐、腾讯等门户网站做了专题报道。爱国者电子是全场惟一一家获得奖项的国内消费电子企业，也是惟一一家获得此奖项的公司，成为现场关注的热点。
爱国者电子科技有限公司成立于2010年1月，新公司成立伊始，总裁兼CEO曲敬东就携全体管理层在三亚召开了爱国者电子全国经销商大会，颁布面向移动互联网时代的全新发展战略，备受社会公众及业内人士瞩目。新公司将继续拓展核心业务，在移动硬盘、U盘、录音笔等领域保持领先地位，做到国内、乃至世界第一。此外，对平板电脑等新业务的拓展也是爱国者电子的工作重心之一。
回顾一年的发展，爱国者电子带给消费者的惊喜不断。4月，爱国者电子发布了具备全新应用模式、纸笔结合的速查录音笔产品。6月，爱国者电子携众多合作伙伴，发布了aigoPad系列平板电脑，该系列产品是当时第一款采用Android操作系统的国产平板电脑。10月，爱国者又发布了第二代平板电脑N700,植入多核处理器、配置了3G通信模块，解决了包括IPAD等国外品牌都不能克服的并行程序处理问题，引领平板电脑进入“并行程序处理”时代。与此同时，爱国这电子麾下的移动存储产品，依旧是国内市场的领导者。
对此，爱国者总裁曲敬东表示，“回望我们年初的企业发展目标，也正是在客户导向的研发产品体系、高效的市场推广策略、服务细分客户的销售体系，这三驾马车的牵引下，我们能迅速的取得成功。正确的定位、远大的目标、优秀的产品，将是爱国者电子赖以奔跑前行的核心推动力。”
我们也相信在卓越的管理团队和广大的消费者共同支持下，爱国者电子这一自主品牌拥有广阔的发展空间，必将在不断自我超越的过程中，实现其值得公众翘首以盼的新目标!

description.hltext_display: ABD'liler hamsiyi sevdi
description.author: Hürriyet Avrupa
description.content:
22 Aralık 2010
Bartın'da 65 çeşit konserve üreten fabrikanın hamsi konservesi, ABD'nin talep ettiği ürünlerin ilk sırasında yer alıyor.
Kentte 1952'de kurulan Türkili Konserve, yılda ürettiği 30 milyon kutu konserveyi iç piyasanın yanı sıra AB ülkeleri, ABD, Avusturya, Çin, Orta Asya ve Afrika ülkelerine ihraç ediyor.
Tuzcular köyü mevkisinde 220 dönümlük arazi üzerinde son teknolojiyi kullanarak üretime devam eden fabrikada her türlü sebze, hazır yemek, haşlama, etli yemek, marmelat, komposto, reçel ve balık konserveleri değişik ebat ve boyutlarda cam ve teneke kutulara dolum yapılarak piyasaya sürülüyor.
Türkili Konserve Fabrikası Sahibi Serhat Çörek, AA muhabirine yaptığı açıklamada, yurdun değişik yörelerinde üretilen sebze ve bakliyat çeşitleriyle et ve balık ürünlerini çağdaş yöntemler uygulayarak konserve haline getirdiklerini söyledi.
Yurt dışı ve yurt içi piyasaya ilave olarak askeri birlikler tarafından da tercih edilen bir marka olduklarını anlatan Çörek, şöyle konuştu:
“ABD'nin ithal gıda ürünlerinde şart koştuğu gıda ve ilaç idaresi yönetmeliklerine uygun üretim yapıyoruz. Yılda 30 milyon kutu konserveyi iç piyasanın yanı sıra ABD, Çin ve Afrika ülkelerine satıyoruz. Uzun yıllardır AB ülkeleri ile ABD'ye çeşitli konserveler ihraç ediyoruz. Bütün mamullerimizden gönderdiğimiz ABD'ye önceki yıl ilk kez 500 koli hamsi konservesi ihraç ettik. Konserveler çok beğenilmiş. Bunun üzerine ABD'deki bir firma bizimle irtibata geçti ve gönderebileceğimiz kadar hamsi konserve istedi. Tabii bizim de uzun yıllardır iç piyasada oluşan müşteri kitlemiz var. Yılbaşından sonra tarafımıza bildirecekleri talep doğrultusunda ihtiyaçlarını karşılamaya çalışacağız.”
Çörek, fabrikalarında bezelye, bamya, türlü, taze fasulye, et kavurma, salçalı tavuk, sebzeli kebap, ciğer yahni, tas kebap, rosto, barbunya pilaki, biber dolma, yaprak sarma, barbunya, kuru fasulye ve nohut haşlamanın yanı sıra palamut konservesinin de üretildiğini bildirdi.
“ÇİFTÇİ ÜRETİM YAPMIYOR”
Çörek, konserveye dönüştürülecek ürünlerin tazeliği ve doğallığının büyük önem taşıdığını ifade ederek, şunları kaydetti:
“Türkili, Bartın'daki 112 dönüm kendi arazisinde ve civar arazilerde doğal ortamda hiçbir suni gübre kullanmaksızın bazı sebze ve meyve çeşitlerini üretip, bu ürünleri işlemektedir. Domates, biber, bezelye, bamya, patlıcan, taze fasulye, biber, yaprak sarma, kuru fasulye gibi ürünleri alım garantisi vermemize rağmen yöredeki çiftçiler yeterli üretim yapmıyorlar. Üreticilere (tohumu, gübreyi biz verelim, siz üretin ve ürettiğiniz ürünü de biz alalım) diyoruz. Ama maalesef insanlar üretimden uzak. Türkiye Taşkömürü Kurumu yöredeki insanları tembelleştirmiş ve tarlalar bomboş duruyor. Köylüler bile sebze ihtiyacını pazardan karşılıyor. Biz de yıllık 200 ton bakliyat, 250 ton sebze ihtiyacımızı yurdun farklı illerinden ve kendi kurduğumuz tarım arazilerinden karşılıyoruz.”
Dikkat: Sitede yer alan haberlerin izinsiz kullanılması durumunda yasal işlem ba

description.hltext_display: Nominert til årets gjennombrot
description.author: Rune Fossum
description.content:
Årets namn-kåringa Norges idrettsforbund har nominert utøvarane til idrettsgallaen 2011. Her er dei nominerte i nokre utvalde kategoriar: Årets gjennombrot: Tarjei Bø, skiskyting Markus Henriksen, fotball Ida Njåtun, skøyter Årets kvinnelege utøvar: Tora Berger, skiskyting Marit Bjørgen, langrenn Sara Nordenstam, svømming Suzann Pettersen , golf Årets mannlige utøver: Emil Hegle Svendsen, skiskyting Thor Hushovd, sykkel Aksel Lund Svindal, alpint Petter Northug jr., langrenn Andreas Thorkildsen, friidrett Tarjei Bø har hatt eit formidabelt gjennombrot i internasjonal skiskyting i 2010.
Først klinka han til med OL-gull på stafetten i Vancouver - deretter har han teke sine første verdscupsigrar no i vinter. LES OGSÅ: Tarjei Bø er nominert til prisen for årets gjennombrot saman med fotballspelaren Markus Henriksen og skøyteløparen Ida Njåtun.
- Det er alltid eit vanskeleg val. Det er sikkert fleire som kunne fortent å vere med enn dei som er komme med, men vi må setje grenser, seier jurymedlem Karen Marie Ellefsen.
LES OGSÅ:
Vinnarane blir offentleggjorte under Idrettsgallaen i Hamar laurdag 9. januar.

description.hltext_display: Kim Kardashian recalls sad Christmas memory
description.author: Cover Media
description.content:
Kim Kardashian once received a puppy as a Christmas gift, but it died of snail poisoning within two weeks.
The 30-year-old reality star has enjoyed another fruitful period in the public eye recently, but has confessed the end of the year often leaves her with mixed emotions. Kim recalls the festive period when she was presented with a puppy for a present only for the canine to perish soon after.
"Valentina was its name, but then she died two weeks later of snail poisoning. You know when snails leave a little trail? [Valentina] got super excited and ate it and died," she told JustJared.com
Despite the tragedy Kim still has fond memories of Christmases past, in stark contrast to her sister Kourtney. The curvy star believes their differing personalities meant they approached the holidays with a slightly different spirit.
"Kourtney would come down [Christmas morning] and wouldn't care, and she didn't really care that it was Christmas, while I was like, 'Oh my God! I got a puppy!' We were so different! Kourtney never just cared about the holiday, but I love Christmas, it's our family's favourite holiday," she added.

description.hltext_display: 吸引嘗鮮客 三線廠平板電腦大賣
description.content:
比PC大廠早推出，售價又便宜 撰文者：林俊劭
分享：
我要回應 (0)
台北資訊展剛過，平板電腦大賣！然而華碩、宏?竟缺席，反倒讓大眾電腦、優派等三線小廠商搶得先機。
▲瘋平板！資訊展上只要與平板電腦有關的攤位，幾乎人潮爆滿。（攝影者．賴建宏）
台北資訊展剛過，今年在蘋果iPad帶動下，紅透半邊天的平板電腦成為展場的熱點，但國內一線PC大廠完全沒有加入戰局，意外讓幾家非以PC為主業的三線廠商竄出頭。
根據資策會產業情報研究所（MIC）預估，今年全球平板裝置（Tablet Device）市場規模將達到一千二百二十八萬台，明年約為三千四百萬台，成長超過一‧八倍，預期至二○一二年將會突破五千萬台。如此驚人的成長潛力，讓眾家廠商均搶破頭要跟進。
優派銷售最熱
九天賣近萬台，緊急調貨
主攻顯示器領域的美商優派（ViewSonic），近年來積極跨入PC領域，接連嘗試推出自有品牌的筆電、小筆電，都未能引發市場關注，沒想到今年搭上平板電腦風潮，推出的第一款ViewPad，在台北資訊展上大放異彩，短短九天的時間內售出近萬台，不僅得要從歐洲緊急調貨供應，每人限購台數也一日數變，從限購兩台到限購一台。
「原本以為可以賣出千台就偷笑了，沒想到第二天就缺貨！」優派國際亞太區行銷協理劉仲宏說。
久未在市場上露面的大眾電腦，在董事長簡明仁交棒給兒子簡民智後，主打第一炮Windows 7系統的平板電腦Tycoon，採用雙重模式銷售，在台灣以自有品牌銷售之外，在海外市場則以設計製造（ODM）、專業代工（OEM）模式，與通路、電信商合作，同樣在展場中吸引到不少人潮。
威寶也插一腳
搭配費率，殺到萬元以下
就連電信商威寶也來插一腳，找代工廠合作推出的自有品牌Vibo VPad，搭配上網費率的優惠專案，售價殺到萬元以下，同樣引來嘗鮮消費者，九天以來也有一千五百台，比預期超出五○％的成績。

description.hltext_display: ．蔡批馬政府棄守 投保只提中資鬆綁
description.content:
民進黨主席蔡英文今天批評，第6次「江陳會」未能簽署投資保障協議，會後公布的階段性共識中，攸關「台商人身安全與自由的保障」也隻字未提，反而將重點放在解除中資來台限制，馬政府棄守立場，未來可能達成的協議令人無法期待。（黃悅嬌報導）
第6次「江陳會」落幕，兩岸簽署醫藥衛生合作協議。民進黨主席蔡英文在中常會前表示，本次「江陳會」不但未能簽署投資保障協議，且根據「江陳會」後公布的「階段性共識」看來，未來投保協議的討論，將依中國所設定的的方向進行，只提中資鬆綁，未提台商安全保障，馬政府已棄守立場。(t)蔡英文：『在250字的共識當中，「台商人身安全與自由的保障」竟然隻字未提，反而把重點放在解除中資來台的限制。中國法治及人權的水準遠低於國際和台灣，因此保障台商安全是人民最在乎的談判事項，但馬政府的談判團隊竟然無法固守，甚至棄守，這令人對於未來可能達成的協議也感到無法期待。』
蔡英文表示，民進黨要求立法院要實質審查所有與中國簽署的協議，協議授權下的工作進行，包括ECFA下的「經合會」、衛生醫藥合作協議下的「工作組」，未來的決議與方案都應該送國會審查，以避免空白授權剝奪了政府公權力。

description.hltext_display: Bell fined $1.3M for do-not-call violations
description.content:
OTTAWA - Bell Canada paid a record-breaking $1.3-million fine Monday after Canada's telecommunications watchdog found the company broke the law by contacting Canadians on the do-not-call list to sell them television, telephone and Internet services.
"All telemarketers must respect the wishes of Canadians who have registered their telephone number on the national (do-not-call list) or requested that a telemarketer include their number on its internal do-not-call list," said Andrea Rosen, the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission's chief telecommunications enforcement officer.
The CRTC said Bell, using mostly third-party telemarketers based in Canada and overseas, contacted numerous consumers between January and October 2010 who had either registered their phone numbers on the watchdog's do-not-call list, or sought to register their numbers on Bell's internal list.
Numerous complaints led the CRTC to investigate Bell this spring, and the two reached a $1.3-million settlement Monday.
The CRTC also found Bell was using automated calling devices to contact its prepaid mobile consumers before obtaining their prior expressed consent.
Bell did not admit the error, but said it would stop making the calls and would make a $266,000 donation to the Institute for Information and Systems Engineering at Concordia University.
Since launching the do-not-call list in September 2008, the CRTC has levied 29 fines.
Until last week, the CRTC had charged violators $195,000 in penalties, but only managed to collect about $10,000.
Last Friday, the watchdog announced it had collected $500,000 from telemarketing giant Xentel after it admitted breaching the law.
The CRTC has received about 350,000 complaints since 2008.
Canadians have registered about 8.9 million phone numbers to the do-not-call list.

event_or_fact.property: All telemarketers must respect the wishes of Canadians who have registered their telephone number on the national (do-not-call list) or requested that a telemarketer include their number on its internal do-not-call list

description.hltext_display: Kotil Barcelona'nın sırrını açıkladı
description.author: Hürriyet Avrupa
description.content:
22 Aralık 2010
Bu yıl çeşitli sponsorluk anlaşmaları imzaladıklarını hatırlatan THY Genel Müdürü Temel Kotil, “Çok nasipli bir şirketiz, Barcelona'ya sponsor oluyoruz takım maçları kazanıyor. Barcelona'ya bir Abu Dabi uçuşu yaptırdık 6 tane kupa kazandılar. Şimdi Kobe Bryant ile kontrata imza attık Los Angeles uçuşlarımız için önemli olacağına inanıyorum” diye konuştu.
Kotil, hava ulaşımındaki gelişmenin hızla devam ettiğini belirterek, “Esenboğa Havalimanı çok iyi ama körükleri yetmiyor. Onun için bazı yolcularımızı otobüslerle uçağa alıyoruz. Buranın büyümesi lazım” dedi.
Kotil, gazetecilere yaptığı açıklamada her sene yeni uçuşlar başlattıklarını belirtti. Yeni açılan uçuş noktaları ile birbirini besleyen hatların artığını ifade eden Kotil, 170 noktaya sefer düzenlediklerini söyledi.
Kendi döneminde kapanan bir hattın olmadığını bildiren Kotil, bir noktaya haftanın her günü uçuş olmaması durumunda yolcuların alternatifleri aramaya başladığını vurguladı.
İstanbul'a uçan yolcuların yüzde 38'inin yurt dışına devam ettiğini belirten Kotil, “Büyümemizi engelleyecek hiçbir şey yok. Şirketimizin itibarı yurt dışında giderek artıyor” diye konuştu.
Şirkette yeni yapılanmaya gittiklerini, yeni yazılımlarla düzenlemeler yaptıklarını anlatan Kotil, THY'nin başarısını merkez ve taşra teşkilatları arasındaki bağın güçlü olmasına bağlayarak, şirket olarak takım çalışmasına önem verdiklerini söyledi.
“Ankara'dan yurt dışına yapılan uçuşların sayısının artırılıp artırılmayacağı” yönündeki soru üzerine Kotil, kararları ticari olarak aldıklarını söyledi.
İç hatlardaki yolcu sayısının 6 kat arttığını dile getiren Kotil, şöyle konuştu:
“Ankara'daki birinci motivasyonumuz iç hatları canlandırmak. Ondan sonra yurt dışı başlayacak. Hiçbir zaman bir şehirden yurt dışına yeteri kadar yolcu çıkmıyor buna İstanbul da dahil. Yurt içi transferleri kaldırırsak birçok seferimizin sayısını azaltmamız gerekir. Son iki yılı AnadoluJet'in yaygınlaşması için kullandık. Ankara'dan yurt dışının belli yerlerine uçuş var. Ancak sefer sayıları çok fazla değil ama 2011'de daha çok olacak.Esenboğa Havalimanı çok iyi ama körükleri yetmiyor. Onun için bazı yolcularımızı otobüslerle uçağa alıyoruz. Buranın büyümesi lazım. Kocaman ülkenin kocaman bir başkenti burası. Dün ya da bugün yeterli olan yarın yeterli olmayacak.”

description.hltext_display: ．陳雲林稱賴幸媛「您」 沈呂巡：口語尊敬用法
description.content:
大陸海協會長陳雲林，昨天在與陸委會主委賴幸媛見面時，刻意避稱賴幸媛的官銜，對此，外交部政次沈呂巡，今天在立院外交國防委會答覆民進黨立委蔡煌瑯質詢時表示，陳雲林使用「您」，是口語中比較尊敬的稱呼，蔡煌瑯對這個回答並不滿意，還說沈呂巡的態度，唸書時一定會霸凌同學，沈呂巡則說，自己小時候個小、內向又害羞，「也許被霸凌」。（程平報導）
沈呂巡舉對教廷的外交禮儀為例，強調通常都會稱對方的官員「閣下」，因此他認為，站在外交的立場，陳雲林稱賴幸媛「您」，是口語中尊敬的稱呼。(t)
只是沈呂巡的答覆，被蔡煌瑯批評是巧言亂德，還說依照沈呂巡的個性，讀書時可能除了馬總統外，一定會霸凌其他同學，沈呂巡則說，也許自己才被霸凌。(t)
此外針對沈呂巡引用史記中的「偶語棄市」，來評論約束官員言行的「大嘴巴條款」，但考試院長關中卻也引論語中「巧言亂德，小不忍則亂大謀」回應，沈呂巡則說，關中是他的老師，他很尊重關中，兩人沒有過節。

description.hltext_display: Nicole Kidman opens up about adopted children
description.author: Cover Media
description.content:
Nicole Kidman would ?love? her and ex-husband Tom Cruise?s adopted children to live with her.
The 43-year-old Hollywood actress and actor Tom divorced in 2001, with their two adoptive kids Isabella, 18, and 15-year-old Connor choosing to spend most of their time with their father at his Los Angeles home.
Nicole lives in Nashville with her second husband, country singer Keith Urban, and they have a two-year-old daughter named Sunday Rose together. While the actress is immensely happy, Nicole would like to see more of Isabella and Connor.
"They live with Tom, which was their choice," she told the British edition of Hello! magazine.
Nicole admits it would be a dream if the teenagers came to live with her and Keith, although she understands their choice and completely respects it. The star has taken a philosophical approach to their decision, and has no plans to pressurise them. She also seeks solace in the fact that she has a gorgeous baby daughter to keep her occupied, and is thrilled to have had a child later in life.
"I'd love them to live with us, but what can you do?" she mused. ?It's a beautiful thing at 43 to have a two-and-half year old!? The movie actress is very proud of the way her ex-husband Tom, 48, has raised Isabella and Connor too. Nicole says she has no grounds to complain, and is acutely aware of how fortunate she has been in life.
"They are healthy and sane and together and are great, great people," she said recently. "So I'm not one of those people that needs to be reminded of what I have."

description.hltext_display: Last minute gift ideas from the Coast Guard
TÜROFED'in yönetimine girmedi
description.author: Hürriyet Avrupa
description.content:
22 Aralık 2010
Turistik Otelciler, İşletmeciler ve Yatırımcılar Birliği (TUROB), Türkiye Otelciler Federasyonu'nun (TÜROFED) önceki gün düzenlenen Genel Kurulu’nda yönetim kuruluna girmedi. TUROB Başkanı Timur Bayındır, TÜROFED'in şehir otelciliğini yeterince kucaklayamadığını ve kendisini tamamen sezonluk otellere adadığını söyledi. Bayındır, "Bu durum karşısında biz de TÜROFED’e eş başkanlık talebinde bulunduk. Olumsuz cevap alınca da, bu dönem hiçbir üyemiz faydalı olamayacağı inancı ile yönetim kurulunda görev almama kararını aldı" dedi.
Bayındır şöyle evam etti:
"Eğer TÜROFED tüm bölgelerin otellerini temsil ediyor ise İstanbul’a da aynı oranda gerekli önem verilmeliydi ve İstanbul da yönetimde söz sahibi olmalıydı. Şayet biri başkanlığı ifa ediyor ise diğeri de eş başkan olarak, dengeyi kurmalıdır. TÜROFED, ancak bu koşullar altında, otelcilik mesleğini temsil edebilir. Ayrıca TÜROFED’in, otelcilik sektörünün tamamını kapsayacak şekilde çözümleri üretebiliyor olması ve her şeyi devlet büyüklerimizden beklemeksizin hayata geçirmesi de önemlidir. Durum, bundan ibarettir."
TUROB’un misyonunun, ülke çapındaki şehir otelcilerini temsil etmek olduğunun da altını çizen TUROB Başkanı Timur Bayındır, şu an İstanbul’un yanı sıra aralarında Bursa, İzmit, Sakarya, Ankara, Erzurum, Kars, Bolu, Trabzon, Muğla, Yalova, Van, Giresun, Uşak, Eskişehir, Aydın, Adıyaman, Edirne, Nevşehir’in de bulunduğu 20’nin üzerinde ildeki üyelerine hizmet ürettiklerini ve bunu Türkiye’nin diğer bütün illerine de yayarak turizmde ulusal birlik ve bütünlük hedeflediklerini açıkladı.

description.hltext_display: A fascinating comment by Hillary's lackey, the Forehead.
Ennio Morricono to Compose Ringtones for LG Smartphones
description.content:
­LG Electronics has announced the release of an exclusive collection of music and ringtones written by movie soundtrack maestro Ennio Morricone. The first such collaboration of its kinds, both newly composed pieces as well as a selection from Morricone's legendary oeuvre, including Cinema Paradiso, The Mission and Love Affair, will be included in the collection.
The agreement covers 25 of Morricone's creations -- 15 ringtones composed specifically for LG and 10 of his best-known tunes from the world of cinema, while the tunes will be preloaded on LG smartphones starting with the LG Optimus 2X set to debut next month in Europe.
Born in Italy, Morricone is one of the most prolific and influential film composers in the world. He has composed and arranged scores for more than 500 films and TV programs over his illustrious career.
"Signore Morricone is one of the best-loved soundtrack composers of all time," said Dr. Jong-seok Park, President and CEO of LG Electronics Mobile Communications Company. "Reproducing his work with such amazing clarity on the Optimus 2X, gives smartphones a whole new level of respect as the primary device for on-the-go music."
In addition to the collection of 25 ringtones and music, LG plans to develop a range of apps with Morricone-related content such as images and video clips for free downloading from the LG Application Store starting next year.

description.hltext_display: Tories appoint two senators
description.content:
National
OTTAWA - A pastor and a businessman are about to enter the Senate to fill two recent vacancies and increase the Conservative government's majority in the upper chamber.
Prime Minister Stephen Harper has recommended that Toronto clergyman Don Meredith and Montreal businessman Larry Smith be appointed to the Senate.
Meredith has previously run for a seat in Parliament as a Conservative and Smith was recently rumoured to be a candidate.
The appointments will give the Tories 54 seats in the 105-seat Senate and give the governing party a three-vote lead.
Meredith, originally from Jamaica, is a Pentecostal pastor and has been involved in several community organizations, including the Black Community Police Consultative Committee, the RCMP Consultative Committee and has been on advisory committees for the chief of police in both Toronto and York Region.
Smith, a native of Hudson, Que., is a former Canadian Football League player with the Montreal Alouettes and he's also served as the league's commissioner. In addition to football, Smith has led a varied and active business life, having served as president and publisher of the Montreal Gazette and in executive roles with Labatt and Ogilvie Mills.

description.hltext_display: 歐洲大雪 港接回滯英學生 (中央社)
description.content:
（中央社記者王曼娜香港22日電）受歐洲大風雪影響，香港多個來往歐洲的班機被迫取消或延誤，不少港人滯留當地。國泰航空公司今天安排4個班機，優先接回滯留英國的400名香港學生。
香港機場管理局表示，由於歐洲大風雪，香港今天有3班來往英國倫敦班機被取消，另有4班來往英國及德國的班機延誤。
國泰航空表示，倫敦機場受到暴風雪影響，運輸量大減，從18日至今，共有15班國泰班機被迫取消，目前約2800名乘客滯留倫敦機場，但因部份乘客已取消或更改行程，還要進一步確認實際滯留人數。
另外，在香港政府協調下，國泰今天安排4個班機從倫敦返港，優先接回滯留倫敦機場的400多名香港學生，他們大多數是在英國讀書的中學生，首批返港的是年紀較小、沒有人同行的13至16歲學童。
香港旅遊業議會表示，香港至今仍有9個旅行團滯留在歐洲，涉及人數170人，其中4個團約100人滯留在倫敦，其餘5個團分別滯留在布拉格及巴塞隆納等城市。991222

description.hltext_display: DHS boys can't duplicate their title-game win
NBA／聖誕節上工惹火禪師 傑克森：足球員那天都放假 (NOWnews)
description.content:
聖誕節大戰是每年NBA的最盛大比賽之一，往往聯盟會安排最具話題性的對戰組合來炒熱氣氛。而今年被欽點的湖人大戰熱火，卻惹惱了「禪師」傑克森（Phil Jackson），並痛批聖誕大戰根本就是造成球員和教練的困擾。
「我不認為任何人應該在聖誕節進行比賽，足球員在那一天都會休假，我實在不了解這樣的安排。」傑克森表示。身為紫金大軍和公牛王朝領袖人物的傑克森，雖然冠軍戒指拿了不少，但每年聖誕大戰也都是聯盟必定欽點的對象。少放了好幾個聖誕節的傑克森，終於在今年忍不住開砲。
「這樣的作法，好像聯盟覺得我們視聖誕節是沒有意義的。我們不只要打球，還要娛樂電視前的觀眾，這真是太詭異了。」傑克森表示。（看公鹿與湖人比賽精采影片請到：http://www.nownews.com/2010/12/22/341-2675757.htm)
不知道是不是禪師開砲，讓湖人球員也因為不能放假而心情低落。湖人在今日（22日）與公鹿的比賽中陷入進攻熄火的狀況，全隊三分球命中率不到2成，罰球命中率也不到5成，自己攻擊熄火還讓公鹿隊拿下98分，攻守表現完全不像是支冠軍衛冕隊，最終公鹿就以98比79擊敗湖人。
公鹿今日靠著「孩子王」柏伊金斯（Earl Boykins）全場最高的22分表現，加上薩蒙斯（John Salmons）的20分表現，一路帶領公鹿壓制湖人。而湖人今日只有三人得分達雙位數，其中以「小飛俠」布萊恩（Kobe Bryants）的21分表現最佳。
「我告訴他們，我不敢相信他們之後還會打的比今天還爛。」湖人總教練傑克森表示，「這就是我們所擔心的，我們在下半場表現失常，而且並沒有好轉。」今日湖人下半場只拿下33分，讓公鹿得以將領先比數拉開，並贏得比賽勝利。
今日NBA其他場比賽結果如下：達拉斯小牛105：99奧蘭多魔術；奧克拉荷馬雷霆99：81夏洛特山貓；芝加哥公牛121：76費城七六人；紐澤西籃網101：94曼菲斯灰熊；金州勇士117：109沙加緬度國王。

description.hltext_display: Judgement day for Taki
description.content:
Hundreds of people blocked the entrance to the Durban High Court on Wednesday waiting to hear the fate of the man accused of murdering 13 women and dumping their bodies in sugarcane fields.
The court is expected to hand down judgment in the case against Thozamile Taki who is accused of killing 13 women after promising them jobs.
Their bodies were found in sugarcane plantations in Umzinto, KwaZulu-Natal, and in tea plantations in Port St Johns, in the Eastern Cape in 2007.
Among the people packed into the court gallery were women wearing ANC Women's League uniforms.
There was a strong police presence outside the courtroom.
The case was expected to start at 10am. - Sapa

description.hltext_display: CBC told to adjust to access law 3 years ago
description.content:
National
OTTAWA - Shortly after coming under the Access to Information Act that allows taxpayers a peek at how CBC spends its $1.1-billion subsidy, the state broadcaster found itself overwhelmed and seeking outside advice on what to do.
A report prepared for CBC and obtained by QMI Agency through an access request advises CBC executives to change the culture of the broadcaster.
"As a regular user of the Act and strong advocate for access to government information, CBC understands better than any other institution the societal values and democratic purpose underpinning the Access legislation," wrote Andre Delagrave in his November 2007 report.
"Now that it is subject to the legislation, CBC needs to shift some of its internal culture and practices in order to attain the level of compliance it would rightly demand of other institutions."
CBC continues to fight the federal information commissioner in court over access to documents and has been subject to almost 900 complaints since coming under the legislation in September 2007.

description.hltext_display: Local Shelters Forced To Turn Away Homeless
description.content:
Advocates: People Relegated To Seek Shelter In Unsafe Locations
UPDATED: 12:07 am EST December 22, 2010
Email Print
Cincinnati Shelters Turn Away Homeless
Embed this Video
Facebook
Digg
Twitter
Yahoo Buzz
Reddit
Delicious
Link
CINCINNATI -- Homeless advocates said Tuesday that all five Cincinnati shelters are turning people away because they are filled to capacity.
Due to the poor economy, more and more people have become homeless, and local shelters can't accommodate them anymore, advocates said.
Josh Spring with the Homeless Coalition said the people who these shelters are turning away have been relegated to seek shelter from the cold weather in unsafe places such as an overpass.
Staci Hariston, 31, said she has experienced being turned away during winter. Hariston said she was pregnant at that time and had to improvise to keep her baby safe.
"I always wrapped an extra blanket around my belly because I wanted to make sure the baby stayed warm," Hariston said.
Hariston said a shelter finally accepted her the day before she gave birth to a baby girl.
Her only advice to the homeless is not to procrastinate.
"If you have to go on a list, go on it," Hariston said.
Homeless advocates said they still don't have an accurate count of how many families need shelter.
In the meantime, homeless advocates said people in need of assistance can call 513-381-SAFE.
